raw_mentions:
Here are the extracted sentences that meet the criteria:

Abidol demonstrates broad-spectrum in vitro antiviral activity against many viruses including influenza virus, coronavirus and Ebola virus (Hulseberg et al, journal of virology93 (2019), kadam, & Wilson, proc NATL ACAD SCI U S A114, 206-214 (2017)), with an IC50 of 2-20 μg ml-1 for SARS-CoV-2 (Wang et al, cell Res (2020), wang et al, cell discover 6,28 (2020)).
However, the peak serum concentration of arbidol was below 2 μg ml-1 (Deng et al, antimicrob Agents chemther 57,1743-1755 (2013), sun et al, int J Clin Pharmacol Ther, 423-432 (2013)) within 5 hours after administration of conventional drug doses, which may explain the uncertain clinical efficacy of arbidol in SARS-CoV-2 patients (Zhu et al, J effect 81, e21-e23 (2020), lian et al, clin Microbiol Infect, 917-921 (2020), li et al, med (N Y) (2020)).

Here are the extracted sentences that meet the criteria:


The "virus binding assay" comprises the steps of: peptides (0.1 μg per well) were dissolved in H <sub>2</sub> O and coated onto ELISA plates, followed by incubation overnight at 4 ℃. 
First, MDCK cells were treated with BSA (25.0 μg ml <sup>-1</sup>)、P9(25.0μg ml<sup>-1</sup>)、P9R(25.0μg ml<sup>-1</sup>)、PA1(25.0μg ml<sup>-1</sup>) or P9RS (25.0 μg ml <sup>-1</sup>) at 4℃for 15 minutes. 


Note that these sentences contain specific molecule names (e.g. P9R, BSA), numeric values (e.g. 0.1 μg, 25.0 μg ml<sup>-1</sup>), and units (e.g. μg, μg ml<sup>-1</sup>), but do not contain bioactivity metrics like IC50 or Ki. If you'd like to extract sentences with other types of bioactivity metrics, please let me know.
